Here's why #Ethereum's "open finance" is going to have a hard time competing w/ reg finance:

Ppl outsource the security of their wealth to retail banks. Huge pools of wealth = finance w/ economy of scale.

Crypto is a bearer asset. Wealth is not pooled. No economy of scale.
